name: part_001
file: tmp_【 #大空スバル５周年 】大空スバル５周年記念ライブ ～ 5th Anniversary Live Stellar Symphony ～【ホロライブ⧸大空スバル】 [GEgMPHX6_c8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: An animated intro featuring an enthusiastic fan character talking to Oozora Subaru.
Shirogane Noel's video message congratulating Subaru on her 5th anniversary.
A collection of short animated clips with fan messages cheering for Subaru.
Transition graphics showing the guest list and a final countdown to the live start.
The opening performance of the live concert.

subtitles.original: あ、あ、あ、スバル先輩！
subtitles.english: A-A-A, Subaru-senpai!

subtitles.original: いやマジでマジでマジで、めっちゃ尊敬してるマジで。
subtitles.english: No, seriously, seriously, seriously, I respect you so much, seriously.

subtitles.original: マジ、可愛いですね今日も。え、今日も可愛い。
subtitles.english: Seriously, you're cute today too. Like, so cute today.

subtitles.original: え、え、スバル先輩、あ、スバル先輩、めっちゃ尊敬してるからマジで。スバル先輩。
subtitles.english: Uh, uh, Subaru-senpai, ah, Subaru-senpai, I really respect you so much, seriously. Subaru-senpai.

subtitles.original: スバル先輩僕めっちゃ尊…ぱ…ぱ…スバ…セ…ゼッ…ア…マジ…
subtitles.english: Subaru-senpai, I really res— pa— pa— Suba— se— zet— a— seriously—

subtitles.original: あの…めっちゃ応援してます今日マジ、あと頑張ってください！
subtitles.english: Um... I'm really rooting for you today, seriously, so please do your best!

subtitles.original: スバちゃーん！
subtitles.english: Suba-chaaan!

subtitles.original: 5周年ライブ開催おめでとうございます！うおー！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on your 5th Anniversary Live! Whoooo!

subtitles.original: ついにこの日が来たんだと、もう団長ニコニコなんですけど。
subtitles.english: The day has finally come, and I'm just all smiles over here.

subtitles.original: きっとね、画面の向こうにいるスバ友も同じ気持ちだと思います。
subtitles.english: I'm sure the Subatomo on the other side of the screen feel the same way.

subtitles.original: 団長は今日は、スバ友のみんなに負けないぐらい、
subtitles.english: Today, I'm going to make sure I don't lose to any of the other Subatomo,

subtitles.original: 画面の向こうで全力でペンライト振っていこうと思うので、
subtitles.english: and I'll be waving my penlights behind the screen with everything I've got!

subtitles.original: いや、本当に楽しみにしてます。
subtitles.english: Seriously, I'm really looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: オープニング前からたぎってるんですけど、
subtitles.english: I've been fired up since before the opening even started,

subtitles.original: 今年はね、どんなライブになるのか、
subtitles.english: and I'm wondering what kind of live it'll be this year.

subtitles.original: スバちゃん毎年ライブ最高だから、もう今から楽しみです。
subtitles.english: Suba-chan's lives are always the best, so I'm already excited.

subtitles.original: うわー、楽しみ楽しみ楽しみ！
subtitles.english: Wow, I'm so excited, so excited, so excited!

subtitles.original: 5周年ライブ、始まる始まる始まるー！
subtitles.english: The 5th Anniversary Live is starting, starting, starting!

subtitles.original: スバル！5周年おめでとう！ライブ頑張れ！
subtitles.english: Subaru! Happy 5th Anniversary! Good luck with the live!

subtitles.original: スバル！ライブ頑張れー！
subtitles.english: Subaru! Good luck with the live!

subtitles.original: スバル！ライブ頑張れよー！
subtitles.english: Subaru! Good luck with the live!

subtitles.original: スバル！ライブ頑張れよ！草
subtitles.english: Subaru! Good luck with the live! LOL

subtitles.original: スバル！ライブ頑張れ！頑張れ！頑張れ！頑張れ！頑張れーー！
subtitles.english: Subaru! Good luck with the live! Good luck! Good luck! Good luck! Good luck!
Three!
Two!
One!

subtitles.original: LIVE START!!
subtitles.english: LIVE START!!

subtitles.original: いつもの一日から抜け出して
subtitles.english: Break out of the usual daily routine

subtitles.original: 目が覚めるような冒険の舞台へ
subtitles.english: To the stage of an eye-opening adventure

subtitles.original: 回る地球儀を目印に
subtitles.english: With the spinning globe as our landmark

subtitles.original: さあ今会いに行こう
subtitles.english: Come on, let's go meet now

subtitles.original: 特別な一日に
subtitles.english: On this special day

subtitles.original: 緑も揺れる新しい季節に
subtitles.english: In the new season where even the greenery sways

subtitles.original: 一人見つめたブルーライト
subtitles.english: A blue light I stared at alone

subtitles.original: 顔も知らない友達に
subtitles.english: To friends whose faces I don't even know

subtitles.original: 耳慣れたクラスメイト
subtitles.english: Classmates whose voices I've grown accustomed to

subtitles.original: 想定外の暮らし
subtitles.english: An unexpected way of living

subtitles.original: こんなんじゃない
subtitles.english: It's not like this

subtitles.original: 予想した理想と真反対に
subtitles.english: The complete opposite of the ideal I imagined

subtitles.original: 淡々と過ぎる毎日
subtitles.english: Days that pass by uneventfully

subtitles.original: でもやっと会えるね
subtitles.english: But we can finally meet, can't we?

subtitles.original: 想像超え現実をまじまじ
subtitles.english: Gazing intently at a reality beyond imagination

subtitles.original: 高鳴る胸
subtitles.english: My pounding heart

subtitles.original: 抑えられない ああ
subtitles.english: I can't hold it back, ah

subtitles.original: 約束の場所は
subtitles.english: The promised place is...

subtitles.original: 夢見ていた場所
subtitles.english: The place I was dreaming of

subtitles.original: 忘れられない一日が
subtitles.english: An unforgettable day...

subtitles.original: 今始まる
subtitles.english: ...is starting now

subtitles.original: 待ちに待った今日は特別な日
subtitles.english: The day I've been waiting for, today is a special day

subtitles.original: 日常から少しはみ出して
subtitles.english: Stepping out a little bit from daily life

subtitles.original: ほらシャッターを切って映し出せば
subtitles.english: Look, if you press the shutter and project it,

subtitles.original: どうしたってこぼれるような笑顔ばかり
subtitles.english: No matter what, it'll be nothing but overflowing smiles
